text_block_list.name: [Demon]
text_block_list.text: —— At last, the end of Hallowe'en is upon us.

text_block_list.name: [Demon]
text_block_list.text: The time is here. Offer up your pure and precious soul to me, and fulfill your century-old desire. …Now, where is my soul!

text_block_list.name: [Mechanical Doll]
text_block_list.text: …… The soul I am to offer……

text_block_list.name: [Mechanical Doll]
text_block_list.text: …… I don't have it.

text_block_list.name: [Demon]
text_block_list.text: … Huh? Do you really think I don't know? I know you have it.

text_block_list.name: [Mechanical Doll]
text_block_list.text: …… I do, but ―― Ah, I get it now.

text_block_list.name: [Mechanical Doll]
text_block_list.text: Because I experienced being touched. I've come to understand… the shape of this heart.

text_block_list.name: [Mechanical Doll]
text_block_list.text: … I am… … I am ending our deal.

text_block_list.name: [Demon]
text_block_list.text: What's wrong with you? After waiting alone for a century, you suddenly don't want to know your reason for existence!?

text_block_list.name: [Mechanical Doll]
text_block_list.text: It doesn't matter anymore. I… It doesn't matter who or what I am.

text_block_list.name: [Demon]
text_block_list.text: You're still a monster, you know? Neither alive nor dead, not even a name!

text_block_list.name: [Mechanical Doll]
text_block_list.text: —— "Friend"… My name is the "Friend" of that girl, and that's enough.

text_block_list.name: [Demon]
text_block_list.text: …… Haha! Was it such a joy for you to have been entertained? You seem to have forgotten that you could only enter the village on Hallowe'en.

text_block_list.name: [Demon]
text_block_list.text: Once your true identity is revealed, you'll not only be alone again, but shunned as well. And that girl who got involved with you might face consequences too ——

text_block_list.name: [Mechanical Doll]
text_block_list.text: I will leave the village. Demon, it's time for us to part ways here. Farewell……

text_block_list.name: [Mechanical Doll]
text_block_list.text: …… Why are you here?

text_block_list.name: [Young Girl]
text_block_list.text: I've been waiting for you! Guess what, I'm finally going on a journey!

text_block_list.name: [Young Girl]
text_block_list.text: Will you come with me? We promised, remember?

text_block_list.name: [Mechanical Doll]
text_block_list.text: … Yes, but I ——

text_block_list.name: [Young Girl]
text_block_list.text: You're my friend, that's all that matters! The memories we're going to make together will prove it.

text_block_list.name: [Young Girl]
text_block_list.text: Let's make lots of memories together. We'll see so many things in the world, … and experience so many more!

text_block_list.name: [Mechanical Doll]
text_block_list.text: —— Yes… My… friend…

text_block_list.name: [Mechanical Doll]
text_block_list.text: …… Farewell. Farewell. To become "myself", I must say goodbye to "myself".

text_block_list.name: [Mechanical Doll]
text_block_list.text: —— To the lonely "Mechanical Doll", farewell. Farewell……

text_block_list.name: [Demon]
text_block_list.text: … Speaking of it sounds cliché, just another mundane farewell. Tch, I've told such a dull story ——

text_block_list.name: [Demon]
text_block_list.text: ……? Hey, weirdo. Where did you go? ……… So, as always, that's how it is. I'm so……

text_block_list.name: [Bard]
text_block_list.text: Fret not, my friend, for I've lingered in this midst, an audience enthralled. Your narrative, enchanting in its essence, eclipses even the grandest sagas of inebriated valor!

text_block_list.name: [Bard]
text_block_list.text: In the wake of the demon's usurpation, as the bard's essence wanes, I shall willingly take part to continue the ending!

text_block_list.name: [Demon]
text_block_list.text: …… Continue the ending?

text_block_list.name: [Bard]
text_block_list.text: Aye, I am familiar with the entirety of that tale. Its continuation, and its conclusion. My presence in this village is a testament to my quest to fathom your story's depths.

text_block_list.name: [Bard]
text_block_list.text: —— Nestled beneath a sea of clovers, it was discovered. Solitary, yet radiating a serene demeanor.

text_block_list.name: [Bard]
text_block_list.text: "I've beheld a century's worth of this world". Its voice, timeworn and coarse, reverberated. But as the final moments drew near, a single lingering worry it whispered into the air ——

text_block_list.name: [Bard]
text_block_list.text: The demon, a lone soul, treads twixt life and death's thread. Through the ages, he persists…… like a visitor in a strange mansion, loneliness widespread.

text_block_list.name: [Bard]
text_block_list.text: So I forged a solemn pledge with him. ―― Aye, dear friend, my journey to this village was destined to be in your name.

text_block_list.name: [Demon]
text_block_list.text: Friend……

text_block_list.name: [Bard]
text_block_list.text: Yes. A bard and a demon touring through hell together… It has quite an intriguing ring to it. In truth, I was getting weary of merely composing poetry in the tavern.

text_block_list.name: [Demon]
text_block_list.text: …… Do you know what it means to go down to hell with me? You'll die and roam a world filled with screams… for eternity.

text_block_list.name: [Bard]
text_block_list.text: Life is transient anyway. It lacks purpose — God didn't assign one. That's why I prefer hell. I can ascribe it my own value.

text_block_list.name: [Demon]
text_block_list.text: … Hah. Bards are unquestionably crazy.

text_block_list.name: [Bard]
text_block_list.text: Not exactly. I'm the one who's eccentric. Doesn't that make a fitting friend for you? Embracing the never-ending monotony, willingly plunging myself into it.

text_block_list.name: [Bard]
text_block_list.text: Now, my friend, let's take a leisurely stroll. Hallowe'en for this year is coming to an end. Before another tranquil day begins, let's bid farewell to tonight's stage……

text_block_list.name: [Bard]
text_block_list.text: —— Adieu!
(―― Clap Clap……!)
(Clap Clap Clap Clap Clap Clap Clap Clap……!)

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: … Uuugh, I'm freakin' exhausted. How much longer is this going to go on for?

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text: Ahaha! Forever, Shakur! In the memories of one and all, this applause is fixin' to linger.

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text: Kris S, what 'bout you? What's stirrin' inside of you at this moment?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: I… don't know how to describe it…
